meanings: evacuation, pullout; (군대의) withdrawal, evacuate, pull out (of); (군대가) withdraw (from)

examples.korean: We retreated back down the mountain. 발음듣기 우리는 산 아래로 철수했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We retreated back down the mountain. 발음

examples.korean: the withdrawal of the UN troops from the region 발음듣기 그 지역에서의 유엔군 철수 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the withdrawal of the UN troops from the region 발음

examples.korean: They are pulling their troops out of the war zone. 발음듣기 그들은 그 전쟁 지역에서 군대를 철수시키고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They are pulling their troops out of the war zone. 발음

examples.korean: Government troops were forced to withdraw. 발음듣기 정부군은 어쩔 수 없이 철수해야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Government troops were forced to withdraw. 발음

examples.korean: Both powers withdrew their forces from the region. 발음듣기 양 강대국은 그 지역에서 군대를 철수시켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Both powers withdrew their forces from the region. 발음
